original: slob dpon dpa' bo mdzad pa'i skyes pa'i rabs rgya cher bshad pa las spre'u'i rgyal po'i skyes pa'i rabs so /
analyzed: slob dpon dpa' bo mdzad pa'i skyes pa'i rabs rgya cher bshad pa las spre'u'i rgyal po'i skyes pa'i rabs so /
translated: This was the story of the king of the monkeys, from the Bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatā, composed by Kşemendra, the ornament of the world.

original: // / bzod pa la goms pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: // / bzod pa la goms pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The story of the practice of patience

original: sku tshe snga ma dag tu bzod pa'i rgyu bsgoms par bstan to //
analyzed: sku tshe snga ma dag tu bzod pa'i rgyu bsgoms par bstan to //
translated: teaches the cultivation of the cause of patience in former lives.

original: smras pa / so sor brtags te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: smras pa / so sor brtags te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says: “Having analyzed” is stated.

original: so sor brtags pa'i rkyen gyis so //
analyzed: so sor brtags pa'i rkyen gyis so //
translated: By the condition of having analyzed.

original: yang na bzod pa la goms pa zhes bya ba na /
analyzed: yang na bzod pa la goms pa zhes bya ba na /
translated: Or, “having cultivated patience” is stated

original: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bzod pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir smras pa'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bzod pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir smras pa'o //
translated: in order to teach that patience arises from cultivation.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rkang gis bstan to //
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni nyes pa mang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rkang gis bstan to //
translated: “Dwelling in a home is a multitude of troubles” and so on is stated by a line.

original: khyim na gnas pa ni skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid dang ldan par bstan pa ste /🔽de las nyes pa mang po'i sdug bsngal dang ldan zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa ni skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid dang ldan par bstan pa ste / de las nyes pa mang po'i sdug bsngal dang ldan zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: Dwelling in a home is taught to be associated with the defilement of birth, the defilement of karma, and the defilement of the afflictions.🔽“It is associated with a multitude of troubles and suffering” is stated

original: mthong ba'i chos la skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: mthong ba'i chos la skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: by this. The defilement of birth in the present life is taught.

original: srid dang 'dod ba lhur len pas nye bar ma zhi ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: srid dang 'dod ba lhur len pas nye bar ma zhi ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: “It is not peaceful because of the pursuit of existence and desire” is stated🔽by this.

original: yun ring bor yang skye @306b ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs ba nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: yun ring bor yang skye @306b ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs ba nyid du bstan to //
translated: It is also taught to be afflicted by the afflictions of birth, even for a long time.

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang la sogs pas ni nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: It is taught to be afflicted by the afflictions of the afflictions, such as attachment and aversion.

original: nyon mongs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of afflictions:

original: mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang par bya ba ste /
analyzed: mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang bsgom pas spang par bya ba ste /
translated: those to be abandoned by the path of seeing and those to be abandoned by the path of cultivation.

original: des kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid du ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: des kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid du ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: The afflictions should be applied as appropriate to the afflictions.

original: bya ba ngan pa'i skal bas chos bya ba'i go skabs med par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: bya ba ngan pa'i skal bas chos bya ba'i go skabs med par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: It is known as the absence of opportunity for Dharma practice due to the misfortune of bad actions. This teaches the affliction of karma.

original: nyes pa de lta bu med pa'i bde ba can du zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa de lta bu med pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: nyes pa de lta bu med pa'i bde ba can du zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa de lta bu med pa'i bar ro //
translated: In the Land of Bliss, which is free from such faults, means up to the absence of such afflictions.

original: tshul khrims zhes smos pas ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims zhes smos pas ni /
translated: By mentioning morality,

original: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa bstan to //
analyzed: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa bstan to //
translated: the training in superior morality is taught.

original: mang du thos pa zhes smos pas ni lhag pa'i shes rab bstan to //
analyzed: mang du thos pa zhes smos pas ni lhag pa'i shes rab bstan to //
translated: The expression learned indicates the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab tu zhi ba smos pas lhag pa'i sems so //
analyzed: rab tu zhi ba smos pas lhag pa'i sems so //
translated: The expression pacified indicates the perfection of meditation.

original: rgyu gsum gyis bzod pa smra ba zhes bya bar ming du btags te /
analyzed: rgyu gsum gyis bzod pa smra ba zhes bya bar ming du btags te /
translated: For three reasons, he is called the one who speaks of forbearance:

original: de bzod par bya ba'i yid dam ma nyams shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de bzod par bya ba'i yid dam ma nyams shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He has not lost his vow to be forbearing, and so on.

original: yid dam bcas pa yang tshig gis bcad pa yin pa'i phyir de bas na bzod pa smra ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid dam bcas pa yang tshig gis bcad pa yin pa'i phyir de bas na bzod pa smra ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Because he has made a vow to speak of forbearance, and because he has not lost it, he is called the one who speaks of forbearance.

original: de'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / gzhan dag la de dang mthun ba'i chos 'chad pa yang de nyid de /
analyzed: de'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / gzhan dag la de dang mthun ba'i chos 'chad pa yang de nyid de /
translated: The expression he praises forbearance means that he praises the virtues of forbearance, and that he teaches the Dharma to others in a way that is consistent with forbearance.

original: bzod pa smra bar bdag nyid kyis khas blangs pa dang / bzod pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / gzhan la bzod pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bzod pa smra bar bdag nyid kyis khas blangs pa dang / bzod pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang / gzhan la bzod pa smra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The expression he speaks of forbearance means that he himself has taken a vow to speak of forbearance, that he praises the virtues of forbearance, and that he teaches forbearance to others.

original: de la dka' thub phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: de la dka' thub phun sum tshogs //
translated: He is endowed with the perfection of asceticism.

original: zhes bya ba'i ming ni bzod ba bya bar yid dam bcas pa ma nyams pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ming ni bzod ba bya bar yid dam bcas pa ma nyams pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The expression endowed with the perfection of asceticism means that he has not lost his vow to be forbearing.

original: mthu rtsal can zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / gzhan dag la de dang mthun ba'i chos 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthu rtsal can zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / gzhan dag la de dang mthun ba'i chos 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The one called “powerful” is the one who praises patience and teaches the Dharma in a way that accords with it to others.

original: de la re zhig bdag ni bzod pa'i yid dam bcas ba ma nyams pas bzod pa smra ba zhes bya ba ni rigs na /
analyzed: de la re zhig bdag ni bzod pa'i yid dam bcas ba ma nyams pas bzod pa smra ba zhes bya ba ni rigs na /
translated: In this regard, the one who is called “a speaker of patience” is the one who has not violated the mental commitment to patience.

original: ci'i phyir bzod pa'i bsngags brjod par byed pa dang / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'chad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bzod pa'i bsngags brjod par byed pa dang / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'chad pa yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it that he praises patience and teaches the Dharma in a way that accords with it?

original: de'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir smras pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de ni bzod ba'i yon tan mthu shes nas //🔽zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos te /
analyzed: de ni bzod ba'i yon tan mthu shes nas // zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos te /
translated: Having understood the power of the virtues of patience,🔽he praises patience and teaches the Dharma in a way that accords with it.🔽Having understood the power of the virtues of patience is the cause for praising patience.

original: de ni bzod pa'i yon tan mthu shes nas //
analyzed: de ni bzod pa'i yon tan mthu shes nas //
translated: Having understood the power of the virtues of patience,🔽he praises patience and teaches the Dharma in a way that accords with it.

original: zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyus so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyus so //
translated: Having understood the power of the virtues of patience is the cause for praising patience.

original: de yis bdag bzhin 'jig rten rab tu brgyan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de yis bdag bzhin 'jig rten rab tu brgyan // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He adorns the world just as he has adorned himself.

original: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos go rims bzhin du 'chad //🔽zhes bya ba'i rgyus @307a * //
analyzed: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos go rims bzhin du 'chad //🔽zhes bya ba'i rgyus @307a * //
translated: He teaches the Dharma in a way that accords with it.

original: so ; / bzod pa'i gtam yang rgyun du byed par gyur //
analyzed: so ; / bzod pa'i gtam yang rgyun du byed par gyur //
translated: and he is always talking about patience.

original: ces bya ba la gtam rgyun du byed pa ni rnams pa gnyis so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la gtam rgyun du byed pa ni rnams pa gnyis so //
translated: “Always talking” is twofold:

original: bzod pa chen po rang gi ngang du gyur //
analyzed: bzod pa chen po rang gi ngang du gyur //
translated: he is always talking about patience.

original: ces bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos te /
translated: The verse says:🔽“He is always talking about patience.”

original: sngar bstan pa'i don 'dis bsdu zhing rig par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sngar bstan pa'i don 'dis bsdu zhing rig par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is taught by the above-mentioned meaning.

original: bzod ba chen po rang gi ngang du gyur //
analyzed: bzod ba chen po rang gi ngang du gyur //
translated: “He is always talking about patience”

original: ces bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: teaches

original: gang sngar bstan pa'i bzod par bya ba'i yid dam ma nyams pa zhes bya ba de nyid bstan to //
analyzed: gang sngar bstan pa'i bzod par bya ba'i yid dam ma nyams pa zhes bya ba de nyid bstan to //
translated: the very patience that was previously taught, called “not losing one’s temper.”

original: de yi don dang mthun pa'i gtam dag gis //
analyzed: de yi don dang mthun pa'i gtam dag gis //
translated: “With talk that is in accord with that”🔽teaches

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bzod pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bzod pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed la /
translated: the praise of patience that was previously taught.

original: de la mthun pa'i chos kyang rgyun du 'chad //
analyzed: de la mthun pa'i chos kyang rgyun du 'chad //
translated: “He always teaches the Dharma that accords with it”🔽teaches

original: ces bya ba de ston to ;
analyzed: ces bya ba de ston to ;
translated: the Dharma that accords with that.

original: / rab tu dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba ni rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: / rab tu dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba ni rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' ba'o //
translated: “In a secluded and pleasant place” means in a secluded and pleasant place.

original: dus thams cad du rnyed par sla ba'i me tog dang / 'bras bu gang na yod pa de ni /
analyzed: dus thams cad du rnyed par sla ba'i me tog dang / 'bras bu gang na yod pa de ni /
translated: The place where flowers and fruits are always easily obtained is

original: me tog dang / 'bras bu dus thams cad du rnyed sla ba'o //
analyzed: me tog dang / 'bras bu dus thams cad du rnyed sla ba'o //
translated: the place where flowers and fruits are always easily obtained.

original: skyed mos tshal nyid dga' zhing mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba shin tu mdzes pa de'o //
analyzed: skyed mos tshal nyid dga' zhing mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba shin tu mdzes pa de'o //
translated: The garden is delightful and beautiful, and that is the delightful and beautiful garden.

original: bkra shis pa ni thos pa'i chos la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bkra shis pa ni thos pa'i chos la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Auspicious means that it bestows the desired result of the Dharma that is heard.

original: yid du 'ong ba ni mthong ba'i chos kyi yid kyi dri ma sel ba'i phyir ro //🔽rten ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu smin par byed pa'i sdig pa 'khru ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba ni mthong ba'i chos kyi yid kyi dri ma sel ba'i phyir ro // rten ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu smin par byed pa'i sdig pa 'khru ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Delightful means that it removes the mental defilements of the present Dharma.🔽The basis means that it is the basis for the arising of the virtuous causes of the delightful results of the next world.

original: dka' thub kyi tshal ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu dge ba skye ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dka' thub kyi tshal ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu dge ba skye ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The forest of ascetics is the basis for the arising of the virtuous causes of the delightful results of the next world.

original: skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan pas khyad par du gyur pa ni /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan pas khyad par du gyur pa ni /
translated: The forest of ascetics is superior to the garden in terms of qualities.

original: skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan bas lhag ba'o //
analyzed: skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan bas lhag ba'o //
translated: It is superior to the qualities of a pleasure grove.

original: de'i gnas su gyur pa ni skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan bas kyang lhag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i gnas su gyur pa ni skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan bas kyang lhag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o ;
translated: It is a place of rest, superior to the qualities of a pleasure grove.

original: /'khrid shing 'khyil pas gtibs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: /'khrid shing 'khyil pas gtibs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is covered with trees that are bent down with clusters of fruit.

original: grang pha sel bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: grang pha sel bar byed pa ste /
translated: It dispels the heat.

original: lding khang ni bsil ba'o //🔽me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing dgod pa bzhin //
analyzed: lding khang ni bsil ba'o // me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing dgod pa bzhin //
translated: The palace is cool.🔽Like a garden planted with flowering trees,

original: padma rab tu rgyas pa'i mtsho 'gram na //
analyzed: padma rab tu rgyas pa'i mtsho 'gram na //
translated: on the banks of a lake with fully blossomed lotuses.

original: zhes bya bas ni tsha ba btsal bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni tsha ba btsal bas so //
translated: This is because it dispels the heat.

original: gzhal med khang la lta bas chags gyur ba//
analyzed: gzhal med khang la lta bas chags gyur ba//
translated: Gazing at the palace, one becomes attached.

original: zhes bya ba ni dus dro ba'i phyir dang / gzhal med khang rab tu mdzes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dus dro ba'i phyir dang / gzhal med khang rab tu mdzes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the time is warm and the palace is very beautiful.

original: padma'i mtsho zhes bya ba la padma'i mtsho ni grang pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: padma'i mtsho zhes bya ba la padma'i mtsho ni grang pa'i phyir te /
translated: The lake of lotuses is cool.

original: dus ni dro ba nyid kyis bung ba dang rad pa bzhin du me tog shing la zhes pa ni me tog la lhag par chags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus ni dro ba nyid kyis bung ba dang rad pa bzhin du me tog shing la zhes pa ni me tog la lhag par chags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The time is warm. Like bees and butterflies, one is attached to the flowering trees.

original: skabs ni mtshams te /
analyzed: skabs ni mtshams te /
translated: The word occasion means interval.

original: dus la bas bar @307b shes pa ste /
analyzed: dus la bas bar @307b shes pa ste /
translated: The word time means interval.

original: gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro //🔽ji ltar dga' ba'i tshan tshan du chad pa de ni dga' ste /
analyzed: gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pa'i phyir ro // ji ltar dga' ba'i tshan tshan du chad pa de ni dga' ste /
translated: Because he was under the influence of sleep.🔽The word pleasurable means pleasurable.

original: dga' sder chad pa'o //
analyzed: dga' sder chad pa'o //
translated: The word pleasurable means pleasurable.

original: des na dka' thub kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to //
analyzed: des na dka' thub kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to //
translated: Therefore, he went to the place of asceticism.

original: bsnyen dka' ba'i rgyus rab tu zab pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyen dka' ba'i rgyus rab tu zab pa'o //
translated: Because of the difficulty of access, it is very deep.

original: dka' thub kyi dpal 'bar ba dang / bsam gtan la goms par byas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //🔽g-yeng ba dang / 'dzem pa dang / 'phyar ba gang gis btang ba de ni /
analyzed: dka' thub kyi dpal 'bar ba dang / bsam gtan la goms par byas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bkag pa'i phyir ro // g-yeng ba dang / 'dzem pa dang / 'phyar ba gang gis btang ba de ni /
translated: The words the glory of asceticism blazed forth and he practiced meditation mean that he stopped the afflictions.🔽The word abandonment means abandonment.

original: g-yeng ba dang / 'dzem pa dang / 'phyar ba btang ba'o //🔽dri ba ni de dag la nang dri ba'o //
analyzed: g-yeng ba dang / 'dzem pa dang / 'phyar ba btang ba'o // dri ba ni de dag la nang dri ba'o //
translated: The word abandonment means abandonment.🔽The word question means questioning them.🔽The word question means questioning them.

original: de dag la nad dri ba'i skabs nas gleng bslang ba gang yin pa'i gtam don de dag la nang dri pa'i skabs nas gleng bslang ba'o //
analyzed: de dag la nad dri ba'i skabs nas gleng bslang ba gang yin pa'i gtam don de dag la nang dri pa'i skabs nas gleng bslang ba'o //
translated: The word question means questioning them.

original: go bar sla ba'i don gang yin pa de ni go bar sla ba'o //🔽bud med kyi skye bo dag gis go bar sla ba'i don gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: go bar sla ba'i don gang yin pa de ni go bar sla ba'o // bud med kyi skye bo dag gis go bar sla ba'i don gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is easy to understand is easy to understand.

original: bud med kyis go bar sla ba'o //
analyzed: bud med kyis go bar sla ba'o //
translated: That which is easy to understand for women is easy to understand for women.

original: yang na gzung bar bya ba yin pas gzung ba'o //
analyzed: yang na gzung bar bya ba yin pas gzung ba'o //
translated: Or, it is grasped because it is to be grasped.

original: bde bar gzung ba'i don gang yin pa de ni bde bar zin pa'o //
analyzed: bde bar gzung ba'i don gang yin pa de ni bde bar zin pa'o //
translated: That which is easily grasped is easily grasped.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: nad dri ba'i skabs nas gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum gyi dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe ste /
analyzed: nad dri ba'i skabs nas gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum gyi dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang / dpe ste /
translated: In the context of inquiring about illness, the three beginning with arising are the thesis, reason, and example, respectively.

original: go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: They are to be connected in order.

original: ma smad ces bya ba ni ya rabs nyid du skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma smad ces bya ba ni ya rabs nyid du skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Noble means born into a good family.

original: mi'i lus su skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mi nyid du zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mi'i lus su skyes pa zhes bya ba ni mi nyid du zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Born as a human means born as a human.

original: de bzhin dbang po rnams kyang ma nyams rno dang ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin dbang po rnams kyang ma nyams rno dang ldan //
translated: Similarly, possessing sharp faculties without deficiency.

original: zhes bya ba la dbang po thams cad ma nyams pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dbang po thams cad ma nyams pa ni /
translated: Here, all faculties without deficiency means

original: ma tshang ba med pa dang / rno ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ma tshang ba med pa dang / rno ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is complete and sharp.

original: des par 'chi bdag ces bya ba ni 'chi ba'i chos so //
analyzed: des par 'chi bdag ces bya ba ni 'chi ba'i chos so //
translated: The line the Lord of Death is certain refers to the fact that death is inevitable.

original: bag med par gyur ba zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams mi bsten pa'o //
analyzed: bag med par gyur ba zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams mi bsten pa'o //
translated: The line you are careless means that you do not cultivate virtuous qualities.

original: dge ba'i chos de yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims la sogs pa ste /🔽de dag la ma brten cing /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos de yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims la sogs pa ste / de dag la ma brten cing /
translated: The virtuous qualities are generosity, morality, and so on.

original: ma bsgoms pas ni bslus par gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: ma bsgoms pas ni bslus par gyur pa yin te /
translated: You are deceived because you do not rely on them and do not cultivate them.

original: dge ba'i chos ma bsgoms na ni yang de'i 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma bsgoms na ni yang de'i 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If you do not cultivate virtuous qualities, you will not obtain their fruits.

original: de yang tshe skad cig ma gcig gis zad pa dang / tshe thung ba'i phyir dang / 'das nas kyang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang tshe skad cig ma gcig gis zad pa dang / tshe thung ba'i phyir dang / 'das nas kyang ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, your life is exhausted in a single instant, and because your life is short, and because once it is over, there is no turning back.

original: 'di ni re zhig dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig dam bca' ba'o //
translated: This is the thesis.

original: ci'i phyir slu ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir slu ba yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it deceptive?

original: dge ba mi byed bas so //
analyzed: dge ba mi byed bas so //
translated: Because it does not cause you to do what is virtuous.

original: 'di ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: 'di ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: This is the reason.

original: de'i rgyu rab tu mi 'byung zhing zad pa dang / de'i rgyu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs bcad gnyis smos te /🔽rab tu @308a * //
analyzed: de'i rgyu rab tu mi 'byung zhing zad pa dang / de'i rgyu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs bcad gnyis smos te / rab tu @308a * //
translated: The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.

original: sbyin dang zhes bya ba dang / rigs la sogs pa dman yang zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad do //🔽rigs ni tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'o //🔽gzugs dang / lang tsho'i yon tan dang / stobs rab tu che ba dang / nor la sogs pa ni sbyin ba'i 'bras bu'o //🔽de yang kha dog phun sum tshogs bar byin pas ni /
analyzed: sbyin dang zhes bya ba dang / rigs la sogs pa dman yang zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad do // rigs ni tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'o // gzugs dang / lang tsho'i yon tan dang / stobs rab tu che ba dang / nor la sogs pa ni sbyin ba'i 'bras bu'o // de yang kha dog phun sum tshogs bar byin pas ni /
translated: The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.🔽The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.🔽The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.

original: gzugs bzang ba'o //🔽yang na gos byin pas so //🔽lang tsho'i yon tan rnams dang / stobs rab tu che ba ni /🔽nyams brtas pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba byin pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: gzugs bzang ba'o // yang na gos byin pas so // lang tsho'i yon tan rnams dang / stobs rab tu che ba ni / nyams brtas pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba byin pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.🔽The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.🔽The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.

original: nor gyis phyug par gyur pa ni nor byin pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽phyi ma la yang bde ba 'thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: nor gyis phyug par gyur pa ni nor byin pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽phyi ma la yang bde ba 'thob mi 'gyur //
translated: The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.🔽The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.🔽The bodhisattvas generosity is not attached, not craving, not deluded, not hostile, not fainthearted, not envious, not confused, not attached to rewards, and not attached to evolutionary development.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pha rol du ste /
translated: This is for the sake of the next world.

original: 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba'i rgyus te /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba'i rgyus te /
translated: This is for the sake of the happiness of this world.

original: bde ba ni dge ba la sogs pa yin pas so //
analyzed: bde ba ni dge ba la sogs pa yin pas so //
translated: Happiness is virtue, etc.

original: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang gzung ngo //
analyzed: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas ni bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang gzung ngo //
translated: By saying “generosity, morality, etc.,” he also includes patience and effort.

original: dge ba de ni thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dge ba de ni thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: That virtue is the cause of all of them.

original: 'di las byung zhes bya bas bstan ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di las byung zhes bya bas bstan ba yin no //
translated: This is indicated by “arises from this.”

original: da ni 'bras bu de med par yang sbyin pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'bras bu skye ba'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: da ni 'bras bu de med par yang sbyin pa la sogs pa dang ldan na 'bras bu skye ba'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: Now, in the absence of that result, in order to generate the result when one possesses generosity, etc.,

original: de med kyang de'i dngos po'i rgyu mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de med kyang de'i dngos po'i rgyu mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
translated: he says that even in its absence, the reason for its reality arises.

original: rigs la sogs pa dman yang zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos so//
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa dman yang zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos so//
translated: To teach this, he says the verse, “Even in the absence of the spiritual gene, etc.”

original: sdig pa la ma chags shing zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: sdig pa la ma chags shing zhes bya bas ni /
translated: “Not attached to evil” means

original: sdig pa las ldog par sten te /
analyzed: sdig pa las ldog par sten te /
translated: to turn away from evil.

original: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam las ldog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam las ldog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “turns away from the unwholesome courses of action.”

original: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs yon tan ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs yon tan ldan // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Endowed with the virtues of generosity, morality, and so on,

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'o //🔽phyi ma'i tshe la'ang bde ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'o // phyi ma'i tshe la'ang bde ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning is: “endowed with the perfections of generosity, morality, patience, and effort.”🔽And also happy in future lives

original: 'jig rten pha rol du yang bde ba'i rgyu dge ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol du yang bde ba'i rgyu dge ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning is: “and also the cause of happiness in future lives, such as virtue.”

original: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are the fruits of morality and so on?

original: dbyar gyi dus na 'bab chus rgya mtsho gang ba bzhin //
analyzed: dbyar gyi dus na 'bab chus rgya mtsho gang ba bzhin //
translated: Like a river filling the ocean in the rainy season,

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The meaning is: “like a river filling the ocean in the rainy season.”

original: 'jig rten du bde ba rgyas par 'gyur bar ma zad de /🔽mthong ba'i chos 'di la yang tshul khrims kyi phan yon rigs la sogs pa'i rgyan du yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jig rten du bde ba rgyas par 'gyur bar ma zad de / mthong ba'i chos 'di la yang tshul khrims kyi phan yon rigs la sogs pa'i rgyan du yang 'gyur te /
translated: Not only does happiness increase in the world,🔽but also in this very life, the benefits of morality are the adornments of family and so on.

original: tshul khrims la sogs pa dang ldan pa de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pa dang ldan pa de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that one endowed with morality and so on is adorned with the Dharma,

original: rigs dang gzugs dang lus kyi yon tan rnams kyang rung //
analyzed: rigs dang gzugs dang lus kyi yon tan rnams kyang rung //
translated: and also the qualities of family, form, and body.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos so //
translated: This is the verse.

original: 'di'i bsdus @308b pa'i don ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bdag nyid che ba dang / 'byor pa dang / g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i bsdus @308b pa'i don ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bdag nyid che ba dang / 'byor pa dang / g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: The condensed meaning is that the result of morality, patience, and generosity is the perfection of greatness, wealth, and retinue.

original: de ltar byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba dang / g-yog 'khor 'byor pa'i rgyu de bas khyad par du gyur cing /
analyzed: de ltar byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba dang / g-yog 'khor 'byor pa'i rgyu de bas khyad par du gyur cing /
translated: The cause of greatness and wealth is superior to that which has arisen.

original: de dag gi rgyan du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi rgyan du gyur pa yin te /
translated: It is an ornament for them.

original: ji ltar shing dang / char sprin dang / mtsho dag la me tog dang / glog phran 'gyu ba dang / bung ba myos pa 'du ba'i padma lta bu ste /
analyzed: ji ltar shing dang / char sprin dang / mtsho dag la me tog dang / glog phran 'gyu ba dang / bung ba myos pa 'du ba'i padma lta bu ste /
translated: Like a tree, a rain cloud, and a lake, a flower, a flash of lightning, and a gathering of intoxicated bees are for a lotus.

original: de la shing lta bu ni tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: de la shing lta bu ni tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ste /
translated: Among them, the tree is the result of morality.

original: da ltar byung ba'i bdag nyid chen po'i mtho ba nyid de la rgyan du gyur bar byed de /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i bdag nyid chen po'i mtho ba nyid de la rgyan du gyur bar byed de /
translated: It is the height of greatness in the present life, and it acts as an ornament for it.

original: de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa'i mtho ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu da ltar byung ba'i tshul khrims te /
analyzed: de las kyang khyad par du gyur pa'i mtho ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu da ltar byung ba'i tshul khrims te /
translated: The cause of the most excellent and exalted enjoyments is present morality.

original: ji ltar shing rnams mtho ba nyid la gzhan me tog gis brgyan pa'i rgyus so //
analyzed: ji ltar shing rnams mtho ba nyid la gzhan me tog gis brgyan pa'i rgyus so //
translated: And just as trees are exalted and adorned with flowers,

original: char sprin lta bu ni da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: char sprin lta bu ni da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: The cloud is like the present result of generosity, the most excellent enjoyments.

original: chang gyi rtags glog phran 'gyu ba lta bu ni sbyin pa po'i rtags ma 'ongs pa na khyad par du gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba /
analyzed: chang gyi rtags glog phran 'gyu ba lta bu ni sbyin pa po'i rtags ma 'ongs pa na khyad par du gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba /
translated: The lightning is like the sign of the donor, the most excellent enjoyments of his future exalted body.

original: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba la byas pa ni char gyi rtags glog phran 'gyu ba dang 'dra bar sbyin pa po'i rtags ma 'ongs pa na /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i 'bras bu da ltar byung ba la byas pa ni char gyi rtags glog phran 'gyu ba dang 'dra bar sbyin pa po'i rtags ma 'ongs pa na /
translated: The present result of generosity is like the sign of the cloud, the lightning.

original: de las khyad par du gyur pa'i longs spyod kyi rgyu dag gis brgyan par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de las khyad par du gyur pa'i longs spyod kyi rgyu dag gis brgyan par gyur pa yin no //
translated: The donor's sign in the future is adorned with the cause of exalted enjoyments that are more excellent than those.

original: mtsho lta bu ni da ltar byung ba'i bzod pa'i 'bras bu bkur sti dang / g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtsho lta bu ni da ltar byung ba'i bzod pa'i 'bras bu bkur sti dang / g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: The ocean-like is the fruit of present patience, namely, honor and a perfect retinue.

original: bung ba myos pa'i padma lta bu ni gzhan de las khyad du gyur pa'i g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu bzod pa da ltar byung ba'i rgyan du gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bung ba myos pa'i padma lta bu ni gzhan de las khyad du gyur pa'i g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu bzod pa da ltar byung ba'i rgyan du gyur ba yin no //
translated: The intoxicated bee-like is the cause of a perfect retinue superior to the former, namely, present patience, which is an ornament.

original: yon tan khyad par 'phags pa lus can dag gi rgyan //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yon tan khyad par 'phags pa lus can dag gi rgyan // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The special qualities are the ornaments of embodied beings.

original: tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa dang / bzod pa rnams kyi khyad bar du gyur pa'i dbang du byas pa ni de las khyad par du gyur pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa dang / bzod pa rnams kyi khyad bar du gyur pa'i dbang du byas pa ni de las khyad par du gyur pa rnams kyis so //
translated: The special qualities of morality, generosity, and patience are considered superior to the former.

original: tshul khrims la sogs pas rigs la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pas rigs la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /
translated: One obtains a family, etc. through morality, etc.

original: gzhan du mi 'gyur bar ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /🔽de bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'gyur bar ji ltar shes par bya zhe na / de bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: How is it known that one does not change to another?🔽In order to prove that, he says:

original: nad med tshe ring nor dar zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos so //
analyzed: nad med tshe ring nor dar zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad smos so //
translated: Health, long life, and wealth.

original: nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / rigs ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
analyzed: nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / rigs ni tshul khrims kyi'o //
translated: health, long life, and high birth are the results of morality;

original: nor ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
analyzed: nor ni sbyin pa'i 'o //
translated: wealth is the result of generosity;

original: gzugs ni bzod pa'o //🔽rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma ni rab 'bring tha ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni bzod pa'o // rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma ni rab 'bring tha ma'o //
translated: beauty is the result of patience.

original: de nyid kyi bye brag dag ni rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag go //🔽de dag sna @309a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bye brag dag ni rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag go // de dag sna @309a * //
translated: The distinctions of superior, middling, and inferior are the distinctions of superior, middling, and inferior.🔽The distinctions of those are the distinctions of superior, middling, and inferior.

original: tshogs pa ni rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa ni rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The variety of those is the variety of superior, middling, and inferior.

original: yang na rab 'bring tha ma dag ni bye brag ste /
analyzed: yang na rab 'bring tha ma dag ni bye brag ste /
translated: Or, the superior, middling, and inferior are the distinctions.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: ngo bo nyid las gyur pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid las gyur pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not from their own nature.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rgyu med pa nyid kyi bye brag las byung ba'i dngos po med de /
analyzed: rgyu med pa nyid kyi bye brag las byung ba'i dngos po med de /
translated: There is no entity that arises from a special cause.

original: 'dis ni rgyu med par sna ba bsal to //
analyzed: 'dis ni rgyu med par sna ba bsal to //
translated: This refutes the causeless arising.

original: sems can sna tshogs pa ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sems can sna tshogs pa ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa ma yin te /
translated: The variety of sentient beings is not produced by another.

original: dbang phyug la sogs pas so //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pas so //
translated: It is not produced by God, etc.

original: gal te rgyu gcig gis bskyed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu gcig gis bskyed pa yin na /
translated: If it is produced by one cause,

original: 'gro ba rnams bye brag med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams bye brag med par 'gyur te /
translated: All beings would be the same.

original: 'dis ni mi mthun pa rgyur smra ba bsal te /
analyzed: 'dis ni mi mthun pa rgyur smra ba bsal te /
translated: This refutes the theory of a non-homogeneous cause.

original: de lta mod kyi rab la sogs pa'i bye brag ni sems las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi rab la sogs pa'i bye brag ni sems las byung ba yin te /
translated: However, the differences of superior, etc. are due to the mental factors.

original: de'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir smras pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: las ni rnam pa gsum las gyur //🔽ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: las ni rnam pa gsum las gyur // ces bya ba ste /
translated: Karma is threefold.

original: rnam ba gsum ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid rnam ba gsum gyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam ba gsum ni lus dang / ngag dang / yid rnam ba gsum gyi dbye ba'o //
translated: The three kinds are the three kinds of karma of body, speech, and mind.

original: de ni so so'i dbang gis mtha' yas pa ste 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi dbye ba mtha' yas par rigs ba nyid do //
analyzed: de ni so so'i dbang gis mtha' yas pa ste 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi dbye ba mtha' yas par rigs ba nyid do //
translated: It is infinite because of the individual differences, because it is reasonable that the infinite variety of beings have infinite varieties of karma.

original: 'di dag las rnam pa gsum las gyur par shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di dag las rnam pa gsum las gyur par shes pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is known that this is threefold karma.

original: 'di ltar 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jug par bya ste /
translated: This should be understood as follows:

original: mi brtan pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig gis 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: mi brtan pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig gis 'jig pa ste /
translated: Impermanent means momentary destruction.

original: mi rtag pa nyid du ston to //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid du ston to //
translated: This shows impermanence.

original: 'chi ba dang nye ba zhes bya ba skal ba mthun pa'i ris las mi rtag pa nyid du ston to //
analyzed: 'chi ba dang nye ba zhes bya ba skal ba mthun pa'i ris las mi rtag pa nyid du ston to //
translated: Approaching death shows impermanence in the class of homogeneous character.

original: sdig pa spang bar gyis zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam mo //🔽dge ba'i phyogs la brten pa ni /
analyzed: sdig pa spang bar gyis zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam mo // dge ba'i phyogs la brten pa ni /
translated: “Abandon evil” means the unwholesome courses of action.

original: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten pa'o //
translated: “Rely on the side of virtue” means to rely on the perfections of generosity, morality, patience, and effort.
